p: The overall case fatality rate was 4.2% (20/475). Two out of 268 patients aged < 50 years died (0.7%), one of whom was under treatment for acute lymphoblastic leukemia. The other patient had an unidentified muscle disease affecting the respiratory muscles [ 8]. There were three deaths among those aged 50–65 years (3/127, 2%) and 15 deaths among those aged > 65 years (15/80, 18.8%).
